column1: Smoque BBQ////First time at Smoque for lunch was a great experience. What a gem for some great BBQ! The smoke flavor and ring on the ribs was perfect
column2: no sauce was even needed. The pulled pork sandwich was very meaty and the flavor was outstanding. The pulled pork plate was hearty and all our sides of slaw
column4: and fries were so so good! Parking can be tough along the street
column5: but it's worth it! Will definitely be going back when back in the city.
